TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RecognizeCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

Docs.summary: 提供 或 物件引發之 事件的資料。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AudioPosition As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan AudioPosition { TimeSpan get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得在與 事件相關聯之輸入裝置音訊資料流中的位置。
Docs.value: 在與 事件相關聯之輸入裝置音訊資料流中的位置。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BabbleTimeout As Boolean
public: property bool BabbleTimeout { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: 取得值，這個值表示是否人聲混串 (Babble) 逾時產生了 事件。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InitialSilenceTimeout As Boolean
public: property bool InitialSilenceTimeout { bool get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputStreamEnded As Boolean
